title: Advanced Cleansing Silk
features: Zero synthetic ingredients, pro-blended effective herbs for a creamy non-drying cleansing
Smoothed away impurities, soften tone & texture, support moisture balance, remove impurities
Perfected cleansing for dry, normal, mature and sensitive skin types
Ultra-gentle daily cleansing for ages 15-75 (ages 15-17 use with supervision)
description: Advanced cleansing silk is a wonderfully anti-aging, gentle, thorough, non-drying approach to cleansing the skin. Silken micronized clays are lushly infused with vanilla orchid, north American rose, wild crafted calendula and Mediterranean olive. These fresh botanicals are carefully blended in a pure organic aloe base, creating a prime cleansing experience that will effectively:- Soothe away impurities- soften tone and texture- support moisture balance- remove environmental toxic debris.
